metadata.title: CVE-2023-52426 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
libexpat through 2.5.0 allows recursive XML Entity Expansion if XML_DTD isundefined at compile time.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.6.0-1
libexpat1 - 2.6.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.0-1').
xmlrpc-c package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
